title: Letters and Words H to P

content: Learners can recognize letters words starting with H to P
Learners can say some words starting with H to P

content.text: It’s a BIG H for Harry
and a small h for hat,
It’s a small i for ice cream
and a small j for jet
It’s a BIG K for Ken
and a small k for key
H, and I, h, and i
I am H, I am I all day
I am h, I am I all day.
J, and K, j, and k
I am J, I am K all day
I am j, I am k all day.
L, and M, l, and m
I am L, I am M all day
I am l, I am m all day.
N, and O, n, and o
I am N, I am O all day
I am n, I am O all day.
P, and, p. P, and p
I am P, I am p all day
I am p, I am p all day
H, and I, h, and i
I am H, I am I all day
I am h, I am I all day.
J, and K, j, and k
I am J, I am K all day
I am j, I am k all day.
L, and M, l, and m
I am L, I am M all day
I am l, I am m all day.
N, and O, n, and o
I am N, I am O all day
I am n, I am O all day.
P, and, p. P, and p
I am P, I am p all day
I am p, I am p all day
